subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Abbott conceded that he did not skate perfectly, but he finished first at the United States championships, earning a trip to Sochi with Jason Brown, 19, who came in second.
snippet: Jeremy Abbott conceded that he did not skate perfectly, but he finished first at the United States championships, earning a trip to Sochi with Jason Brown, 19, who came in second.
